text: 2.52: 1 Sml 2.26; Snd 3.4; Ru 1.80Anan niamuuŋ mba bigi ndɨkndɨk suirav kim, Zisas thav vhuuv, guma ruma mbuav, ŋkasŋka mbatɨga muuŋgiap, thɨga havhargia Fhe Bakɨme nzuai tɨvi kaŋgia nta zɨn vui. Ana maaŋ mbuim, Fhe Bakɨme guigira ana vuzvugiap, ana nzuav ndikndigim, gumgi gu mbigi vhɨra ana vuzvugi.
